name: Rounders Quartet - VR Spatial Audio
description:
A simple spatial audio experience of the song By the Bend of the River performed by the barbershop group Rounders. You can toggle between spatial and standard audio to clearly evaluate the difference as you move around each singer.

  • Menu buttons: toggles the spatial audio processing on/off
  • Trackpad: teleport

Supports HTC Vive VR headset.
